title: ‘All the Alpecin Guys Were Here to Help Van der Poel’: Criticism Flies after Gravel World Championships
content:
4th-placed rider Jasper Stuyven says fellow Belgians prioritized their Alpecin-Deceuninck trade team ahead of the national squad.

Read the full article at ‘All the Alpecin Guys Were Here to Help Van der Poel’: Criticism Flies after Gravel World Championships on Velo.
author: sstokes
